definition: Foreign Affairs Office (at a university)/Foreign Affairs Department
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point

sentences.english: Hello, this is the Foreign Affairs Police.
sentences.chinese: 您好，这里是台北市警局外事处。

sentences.english: The exchange students should give the meal card back to the Foreign Affairs Office.
sentences.chinese: 交换生离校时应把饭卡交回外事处留学生办公室。

sentences.english: Post contracts from Foreign Affairs Department and confirming contract terms with foreign teachers.
sentences.chinese: 外事处寄发合同给外籍教师，确定合同条款。

sentences.english: Both the Foreign Office and the Ministry of Defence have declined to comment on the reports.
sentences.chinese: 外事处和国防部都拒绝对这些报道做出评论。

sentences.english: Good morning. We re from the Foreign Affairs Department.
sentences.chinese: 早晨好，我们是外事处的。

sentences.english: The Foreign Affairs Office is the management unit for foreign teachers.
sentences.chinese: 外事处为外籍教师的主管部门。

sentences.english: Hello, this is the Taipei Foreign Affairs Police.
sentences.chinese: 您好，这里是台北市警局外事处。

sentences.english: Students resuming study should apply for X visa to come to China.
sentences.chinese: 来华自费留学生完成学业后由外事处颁发在学证明。

sentences.english: FAO will arrange physical exam or verification for new students.
sentences.chinese: 外事处将在新生入学后统一安排体检。

sentences.english: Ask for comment from college after Foreign Affairs Department's initial review.
sentences.chinese: 外事处初审后转二级学院，征求二级学院意见。

definition: Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council (abbr. for 國務院港澳事務辦公室|国务院港澳事务办公室[Guo2 wu4 yuan4 Gang3 Ao4 Shi4 wu4 Ban4 gong1 shi4])

Office of Chinese Language Council International (known colloquially as "Hanban"), an organ of the PRC government which develops Chinese language and culture teaching resources worldwide, and has established Confucius Institutes 孔子學院|孔子学院[Kong3 zi3 Xue2 yuan4] internationally/abbr. to 漢辦|汉办[Han4 ban4]

pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Liu2 xue2 Ji1 jin1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
related.word: 国家留学基金管理委员会

definition: matters relating to the Chinese diaspora (as a concern of the Chinese government)
Ministry of Foreign Affairs/foreign office/Dept. of State
United Front Work Department of CCP Central Committee (UFWD)/abbr. for 統一戰線工作部|统一战线工作部[Tong3 yi1 Zhan4 xian4 Gong1 zuo4 bu4]
